verses.text: Mamin Jehová, tzijtum eb' anima ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, tzijtum eb' smeltzajoch vajk'ooloc.
Tzijtum eb' tz'alani to manh ol in a colo'.
Ha achxo Mamin, in Columal ach, uuj tzin tzalaji. Ha ach tzak' in tek'anil.
Ha tzin avaj t'ayach, tzin a tak'vej t'a jun tzalan b'aj syal sb'a eb' anima t'ayach.
Tzin ek' jichan, tzin vayb'ati, te wach' tz'aj yel in vayanh, yujto a ach tzin a tanhvej.
Manh ol in xivlaj yuj jantac anima ak'um oval molaneq'ui, yuj eb' oyanek' t'a in patic vichanh tik.
Mamin Jehová, ochanh ved'oc. Ach in Diosal, colinnhej. Ha ach ol a mak'poj sti' eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin. Manhxalaj jab'oc ol elk'och spoder eb' sk'ulan chucal chi'.
Mamin Jehová, a achton tzach colvajnhej. Ak' a niwan wach'k'olal t'a quib'anh a onh a chonhab' onh tik.
